Room.Name: Platinum and Ruby Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are inside a platinum pyramid, lined with red rubys.
Room.LongDescription: There are but three highly polished walls in this room, representing the alignment of forces in the Land of Mordor. One wall represents goodness, another represents evil, and the third is neutral in alignment. It ties the the other two wall together. The training room door goes through that wall. A statue of a griffon stands in the middle of the room, it's ruby eyes
